hackathon-description-text: Bringing together the brightest minds in the e-commerce space, ecomhack fosters the exchange between innovative companies and talented teams to burst inspiration in the community and create outstanding and sustainable hacks.
hackathon-rules:
1. Start your project from scratch at the first day of the event.
2. Work on an idea related to the topic "Personal Commerce".
3. Include SPHERE.IO and any other of the participating APIs in your concept.
4. Team size 1 - 5 people.
5. Powerpoint-free zone: It’s your demo that’s relevant - leave the flashy slides to the consultants;) If it’s not fully functional (yet), just walk us through the code.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Iot Hack - 5 x Relayr Wonderbars

hackathon-description-header: e-commerce, IoT, Internet of Things, wearables, Beacons, Shopping
